sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Button, Header, Image, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react'
import { Form } from 'semantic-ui-react'

const ModalPopup = () => {
    
    
    
    return(
  <Modal trigger={<Button positive>Join the world</Button>}>
    <Modal.Header>Define your character</Modal.Header>
    <Modal.Content image>
      <Image wrapped size='medium' src='https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/rachel.png' />
      <Modal.Description>
        <Header>Fill out the form</Header>
        <Form className = "add-world" onSubmit = {handleSubmit}>
            <Form.Group widths='equal'>
                <Form.Field label='Name of the character' control='input' value={name} onChange={(e) => setName(e.target.value)} />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Field label='Your Background Story' control='textarea' rows='3' value={description} onChange = {(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)} />
            <Form.Field control='button'>
                CREATE CHARACTER
            </Form.Field>
        </Form>
      </Modal.Description>
    </Modal.Content>
  </Modal>
)}

export default ModalPopup
